title: Microwave-assisted solvothermal synthesis of nanostructured Ga-Doped Li<sub>7</sub>La<sub>3</sub>Zr<sub>2</sub>O<sub>12</sub> solid electrolyte with enhanced densification and Li-ion conductivity
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Seong-Jun Jo, Young Gyu Jeon, Dong-Kyu Kim, Sang Yeop Hwang, Byeong-Heon Lee, Chea Yun Kang, Seung-Hwan Lee, Sung-Hwan Lim, R. Vasant Kumar, Yu-Jin Han, Kwang-Bum Kim, Hyun-Kyung Kim
